# Project Metadata for LLMs
# GraphQL-Prisma-Postgres-TypeScript Boilerplate

name: graphql-prisma-postgres-ts-boilerplate
type: backend-api
language: typescript
runtime: node-22
framework: fastify-5
graphql: mercurius
orm: prisma
database: postgresql
cache: redis
package-manager: yarn
main-entry: src/server.ts

# Commands
install-command: yarn install
dev-command: yarn dev
test-command: yarn test
build-command: yarn build
start-command: yarn start
db-sync-command: yarn db:sync
graphql-generate-command: yarn generate

# Docker
docker-dev: yarn docker:dev
docker-prod: yarn docker:prod
docker-migrate: yarn migrate:shards

# Key directories
source-dir: src
modules-dir: src/modules
modules-dir-feature: src/modules/<feature>
config-dir: src/config
docs-dir: docs
prisma-schema: prisma/schema.prisma

# Generated (do not edit)
generated-types: 
src/types/resolvers.generated.ts 
src/types/typeDefs.generated.ts 
src/types/types.generated.ts

# Additional documentation
agent-docs: AGENTS.md
